declarations.comments: the set of audio buffers identified by any AudioBufferSourceNode
declarations.title: AudioBuffers

declarations.comments: an identifier of a node
declarations.title: NodeId

declarations.comments: the type of Audio node.
declarations.title: NodeType

declarations.comments: An audio node definition
declarations.title: NodeDef

declarations.comments: a reference
declarations.title: Reference

declarations.comments: A full graph
declarations.title: AudioGraph

declarations.comments: A run-time assemblage of nodes built from the graph
declarations.title: Assemblage

declarations.comments: assemble the web-audio graph as a playable assemblage
declarations.title: assemble

declarations.comments: the (type of) an attribute of an audio node
declarations.title: AudioAttribute

declarations.comments: a map of a set of such (named) attributes
declarations.title: AttributeMap

declarations.comments:
an AudioParam definition
see https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/AudioParam
declarations.title: AudioParamDef

declarations.comments: a time in an audio parameter which can either be absolute or relative
declarations.title: Time

declarations.comments: a time in an audio parameter which must be an absolute constant value
declarations.title: TimeConstant

declarations.comments: get a named Number attribute
declarations.title: getNumber

declarations.comments: get a named String attribute
declarations.title: getString

declarations.comments: build an assemblage from an audio graph
declarations.title: build

declarations.comments: compile a graph definition and perform semantic checks
declarations.title: compile

declarations.comments: compile an update graph (which requires no semantic checks)
declarations.title: compileUpdate

declarations.comments: start to play an Assemblage at the given time offset
declarations.title: start

declarations.comments: stop playing an Assemblage after the supplied duration
declarations.title: stop

declarations.comments: start playing and then stop after the supplied duration
declarations.title: startThenStop

declarations.comments: a parse error and its accompanying position in the text
declarations.title: PositionedParseError

declarations.comments: the symbol table currently just holds node ids
declarations.title: SymbolTable

declarations.comments: Parse an audio graph
declarations.title: parse

declarations.comments:
attempt to load the sound buffers for all nodes that identify them
(currently AudioBufferSourceNodes) and return an Error if any fail
or an audioBuffers map if all's OK.
declarations.title: loadBuffers

declarations.comments: assemble the update web-audio graph as a playable assemblage
declarations.title: update

declarations.comments: Parse an integer.
declarations.title: int

declarations.comments: Parse an unsigned integer.
declarations.title: unsignedInt

declarations.comments: Parse a number
declarations.title: number

declarations.comments:
Parse a number which may or may not have a decimal point
we need to try number because both will consume any sign
declarations.title: numberOrInt

declarations.comments: Parse a numeric sign, returning `1` for positive numbers and `-1`
declarations.title: sign
